price: Nama yaadannoo keenya irraa garagalee, jiruu addunyaa malee hin fedhin irraa garagali.
arabic: فَأَعۡرِضۡ عَن مَّن تَوَلَّىٰ عَن ذِكۡرِنَا وَلَمۡ يُرِدۡ إِلَّا ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fa-aʿriḍ ʿan man tawallā ʿan dhik'rinā walam yurid illā al-ḥayata al-dun'yā
